name: Run (itch) (Trap_Meister)
description:
Story: One day you decide to explore the local abandoned train station, you find a curious unlocked door one day and find yourself in a underground complex.

Days later, your phone with the video is the last remaining proof of your existance.

In this game you are stuck inside a area similar to the Backrooms, theres this wierd guy chasing you and your goal is to find a red key hidden in the map and then find the door to exist.

You can hide in the shadows to avoid the wierdo, when doing so there'll be an eye on the screen to indicate if you are hidden.

You can sprint but only for a short while showed off by the screen going red.

Controls: WASD to move.
Left Shift to run.

Left Ctrl to walk slowly(Does nothing).

Escape to quit game(theres no pause menu)

Credits:

Music and white face guy - Ezui
